task: Add a PDF to a document
steps: 1. Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
2. Click on the 'Insert' tab in the ribbon at the top of the window.
3. In the 'Text' group, click on the 'Object' button.
5. In the 'Object' dialog box, click on the 'Create from File' tab.
6. Click on the 'Browse' button and locate the PDF file you want to add to the document.
7. Select the PDF file and click on the 'Insert' button.
8. The PDF file will be added to the document as an object. You can resize or move the object as needed.
9. Save the document to apply the changes.
